mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item_wood (phone, complexion, psychology, cold, sweat, diet, shit, urine, sleep, dizzy, eyes, chest, limbs, menstruate, season, qualitative_a, qualitative_k) VALUES (#{phone}, #{woodComplexion}, #{woodPsychology}, #{woodCold}, #{woodSweat}, #{woodDiet}, #{woodShit}, #{woodUrine}, #{woodSleep}, #{woodDizzy}, #{woodEyes}, #{woodChest}, #{woodLimbs}, #{woodMenstruate}, #{woodSeason}, #{qualitativeA}, #{qualitativeK});
mapper.update: UPDATE item_wood SET complexion = #{woodComplexion}, psychology = #{woodPsychology}, cold = #{woodCold}, sweat = #{woodSweat}, diet = #{woodDiet}, shit = #{woodShit}, urine = #{woodUrine}, sleep = #{woodSleep}, dizzy = #{woodDizzy}, eyes = #{woodEyes}, chest = #{woodChest}, limbs = #{woodLimbs}, menstruate = #{woodMenstruate}, season = #{woodSeason}, qualitative_a = #{qualitativeA}, qualitative_k = #{qualitativeK} WHERE phone = #{phone};
